column4: Hey... I've got a problem with Amarok. When trying to install the MP3-extensions (Adept Batch), it fails (not found or conflicting with other packets) ... is there a way for me to figure out where the conflict is?
are you trying to install the plugin using amarok?
do you have the universe repos enabled?
if so do: sudo apt install gstreamer0.8-mad
(I'm running KDE btw... if it would be relevant) ...
ok... have you tried to install that package yet?
I'm trying to find (in KDE) what repo's are active...
as I thought... (I had it under Gnome) ... it's there...both universe and multiverse
ok then try doing sudo apt install gstreamer0.8-mad
done it... but on launch, Amarok still seems to download a bunch of other stuff, but I don't get to see what it all downloads... so I can't manually install all those :s
can I PM you (it's easier to talk)
